Author: donout_disturb
Text: Me. I always log my weight 0.3 kg higher (half a pound) because I feel like my scale is lying. I also overestimate my calories so I know I'm not going over my limit.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Saaaaame. I do this with my apple watch — can’t log my *actual* scale weight because that would be hubris? Even though underestimating my weight would actually underestimate my calories burned....so.....yeahhh. Logic.
